name: Firefox 4 stop/go/reload on the left [Windows]
description:
Move the Firefox 4 combined stop/go/reload to the left side of the location bar. This is compatible with the Status-4-Evar extension (version 2011.03.10.18b+).

This version is suitable for the Windows version of Firefox.

The Linux version of this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/38262/
The Mac version of this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/45214/
